original_title: You Throw Like a Girl: The Blind Spot of Masculinity
overview: NFL veteran Don McPherson examines how definitions of masculinity adversely affect women and create "blind spots" that hinder the healthy development of men. Using examples from his own life, and generously illustrated with clips from motion pictures, McPherson leads us beyond the blind spots of traditional masculinity and toward solutions that engage men in dialogue.
title: You Throw Like a Girl: The Blind Spot of Masculinity
